resources.string: You are now connected to a Wi-Fi network, please make sure you are connected to the same network as your TV
You are NOT connected to a Wi-Fi network, to apply settings to the TV you must be connected to the same network. You might want to enable Wi-Fi
It was not possible to detect or connect to any TV service on this network. Please try connecting to another network or restarting this process
You are now registered with the TV, the communication between your Android device and your Android TV has been established
Discovered a TV service, trying to connect now. Please do not close settings on the TV app
Searching for TVs on the connected network. Make sure to open app settings on your TV
You are now connected to a TV. Once you are done editing your playlist press SEND button to update channels on your TV
